name: Robert Wilson
description: Robert Wilson, usually just referred to asWilson, is a weapons vendor inCyberpunk 2077. He's a2nd Amendmentfranchise holder, and his shop is located inMegabuilding H10,Watson. Wilson seems to be the tinkering kind, paying more mind to the quality of his merchandise than the efficiency of sales. This is why he will not sell a weapon which hasn't first passed through his skilled hands, although just as well the reason of his continuous complaints regarding the waning business.
